description.name: Garden hose BLACK&RED 1" 10m (strong)
description.long_desc:
BLACK&RED Reinforced Garden Hose 1" 10m is a reliable companion for your gardening tasks, delivering exceptional performance and durability.


Product Features:



  • Polyester Mesh Reinforcement: A 4-layer hose reinforced with polyester mesh ensures exceptional strength and resistance to damage.

  • UV Protection: Special coating provides protection against harmful UV radiation.

  • Working Pressure: Exceptionally high working pressure of 6 bars enables efficient watering even in large areas.

  • Burst Pressure: Burst pressure of 25 bars ensures safe usage even with intense water flow.

  • Temperature Range: Hose flexibility, withstanding temperatures ranging from -20°C to +60°C, allows for versatile use in various weather conditions.

  • Product Manufactured in Poland.


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Geko

  • Color: Black-Red

  • Diameter: 1"

  • Length: 10m

  • Number of Layers: 4 - hose reinforced with polyester mesh

  • Working Pressure: 6 bar

  • Burst Pressure: 25 bar

  • External Temperature Range: from -20°C to +60°C

  • Manufactured in Poland: yes

  • UV Protection: yes

Lawn mower blade sharpener 50mm for a drill
description.long_desc:
Lawn Mower Blade Sharpener – Keep Your Blades Razor-Sharp!


Why choose our sharpener?



  • Versatility: Our sharpener is designed for use with drills and screwdrivers, making it exceptionally versatile.

  • Speed and Convenience: With our sharpener, mowing becomes faster and more enjoyable. Say goodbye to dull blades!

  • Precise Sharpening: The 6 mm cylindrical shaft ensures stability and precision during sharpening.

  • Effective Abrasive Stone: Equipped with a 50 mm diameter abrasive stone, our sharpener efficiently restores blade sharpness.


How to use the sharpener:



  1. Attach the sharpener to your drill or screwdriver.

  2. Turn on the tool and gently begin sharpening your lawn mower blades.

  3. Caution: Remember to take safety precautions and use appropriate personal protective equipment.

description.name: Lawn mower blade sharpener 2x53mm with HEX mount for a drill
description.long_desc:
Knife Mower Sharpening Kit – Keep Your Blade in Perfect Condition! Why choose our sharpener?




  1. Versatility: Our sharpener is designed for use with drills and screwdrivers, making it exceptionally versatile.




  2. Speed and Convenience: With the sharpener, mowing becomes faster and more enjoyable. You no longer have to struggle with dull blades!




  3. Precise Sharpening: The abrasive stones ensure the optimal sharpening angle for petrol and electric lawn mower blades.




  4. Effective Abrasive Stone: Our sharpener comes with two abrasive stones, each with a diameter of 53 mm, effectively restoring blade sharpness.




How to Use the Sharpener?



  1. Attach the sharpener to a drill or screwdriver.

  2. Turn on the tool and gently start sharpening the lawn mower blades.

  3. Warning: Remember to exercise caution and use appropriate personal protective equipment. Safety first!

description.name: Lawn mower blade double sharpener 2x53mm with HEX mount for a drill
description.long_desc:
Double Blade Sharpener with a Set of 4 Stones for Lawn Mower Blades – Keep the Blade in Perfect Condition!


Why choose our sharpener?




  1. Versatility: Our sharpener is designed for use with drills and screwdrivers, making it exceptionally versatile.




  2. Speed and Convenience: With this sharpener, mowing becomes faster and more enjoyable. No more struggling with dull blades!




  3. Precise Sharpening: Equipped with a set of 4 sharpening stones, one for initial sharpening and another (pink) for honing the cutting edge. The abrasive stones ensure the optimal sharpening angle for both gas-powered and electric lawn mower blades.




  4. Effective Abrasive Stone: Our sharpener comes with 4 abrasive stones, each with a diameter of 53 mm, effectively restoring blade sharpness.




How to use the sharpener:

  3. Warning: Remember to exercise caution and use appropriate personal protective equipment while sharpening. Safety first!

description.name: Cement grout applicator tool 850ml + set of 4 nozzles
description.long_desc:
Construction Sealant Gun - Your Reliable Tool on the Construction Site


Are you looking for a durable and versatile tool that can handle the most demanding tasks on the construction site? Our construction sealant gun is the perfect solution for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.


Key Product Features:


Made from Durable Plastic: Our sealant gun is constructed from robust plastic, ensuring long-lasting use and resistance to damage.


Designed for Thick Materials: Perfect for dispensing thick materials such as cement, mortar, bituminous/sealing compounds, and tile adhesive.


850 ml Capacity: The large capacity allows for efficient work without frequent refills.


Set of 4 Nozzles: Equipped with four different nozzles for maximum versatility: rectangular 57x16 mm and 38x14 mm, round 12 mm and 20 mm.


Invest in tools that combine functionality and durability. The construction sealant gun is your reliable partner in any construction project, ensuring precise and efficient work.

description.name: 8pcs dowel pin center point set
description.long_desc:
Set of Dowel Marking Pins - Precision and Efficiency in Your Workshop


Are you preparing for precise drilling of dowel holes? Our set of dowel marking pins is the tool you need to make your projects accurate and professional.


Key Product Features:


Complete Set: The set includes 2 marking pins each in sizes 6 mm, 8 mm, 10 mm, and 12 mm. With this variety, you have everything you need to accurately mark dowel holes of different sizes.


Chrome-Plated Marking Pins: Our marking pins are chrome-plated, ensuring durability and resistance to corrosion. The chrome surface also makes them easy to clean and maintain.


Precision and Accuracy: The marking pins are designed for precise marking of dowel holes, guaranteeing perfect alignment of construction elements. With these, your joints will always fit perfectly.


Invest in tools that provide precision and reliability. The set of dowel marking pins is an essential component for every carpenter, DIY enthusiast, and professional who values accuracy and quality workmanship.

description.name: 7pcs drills set for glass and ceramic
description.long_desc:
Experience reliability and precision with the spiral drill bit set for glass and ceramic tiles from the renowned manufacturer Geko. This comprehensive set includes 7 drill bits ranging from 3 mm to 12 mm, perfectly suited for a variety of tasks involving delicate materials.

  • Manufacturer: Geko
  • Material: Tungsten Carbide
  • Applications: Glass, ceramics, tiles, porcelain
  • Shank: HEX 1/4"
  • Drill Bit Sizes:
    • 3 mm
    • 4 mm
    • 5 mm
    • 6 mm
    • 8 mm
    • 10 mm
    • 12 mm

Product Features:

  • Cross Grind: Allows for drilling without the need for a pilot hole, simplifying the work and enhancing accuracy.
  • Spiral Flutes: Efficiently remove dust and ensure cooling during use, extending the lifespan of the bits.
  • Cutting Element: Equipped with four cutting edges made from sintered carbide, ensuring clean and precise drilling.
  • Usage Recommendations: Drill at low speeds and use additional cooling. Avoid impact drilling to protect the material and drill bit.

Size A B C
3mm 48mm 83mm 6.35mm
4mm 53mm 88mm 6.35mm
5mm 59mm 94mm 6.35mm
6mm 65mm 100mm 6.35mm
8mm 71mm 106mm 6.35mm
10mm 89mm 116mm 6.35mm
12mm 91mm 128mm 6.35mm

description.name: Armature bearing puller 3pcs
description.long_desc:
Complete set of three-jaw pullers, perfect for removing bearings, rotors, brake discs, pulleys, and other components tightly fitted on shafts. This set includes 3 pullers of different sizes, providing flexibility and allowing you to match the tool to specific tasks.

  • Manufacturer: Geko
  • 3" (75 mm): Puller handles components with a maximum diameter of 70 mm and a height of 20 mm, with a grip length of 7 mm.
  • 4" (100 mm): Ideal for components with a maximum diameter of 80 mm and a height of 30 mm, with a grip length of 8 mm.
  • 6" (150 mm): Designed for components with a maximum diameter of 90 mm and a height of 50 mm, with a grip length of 10 mm.

Product Features:

  • Reversible Arms: Allow easy removal of both internal and external bearings, regardless of their depth.
  • Adjustable Arms: Each arm can be adjusted separately, ensuring precise fitting for various components.
  • Robust Construction: Arms are made from hardened and forged tool steel, guaranteeing durability and long tool life.
  • Dual-Sided Design: Enables the removal of both external and internal components, even if they are seated at different depths.

description.name: Double-sided nylon measure tape 3m/16mm CLASS I
description.long_desc:
Double-Sided Measuring Tape 3m/16mm Class 1 – Precision, Durability, and Ergonomics


The double-sided measuring tape with a length of 3 meters and a tape width of 16 mm is the ideal tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Thanks to its design and high-quality materials, this tape meets the demands of the most discerning users. Perfect for workshop, construction, carpentry, renovation, and all kinds of household tasks. Suitable for both professional and amateur use.


Features and Benefits:




  • Double-Sided Measuring Tape – Enables precise readings on both the front and back of the tape, enhancing convenience during use.




  • Class 1 Accuracy – Ensures precise measurements in accordance with European standards, perfect for tasks requiring the highest accuracy.




  • Durable Tape (3m Length, 16mm Width) – Offers readability, strength, and stability during measurements.




  • Rubberized Casing – A durable housing resistant to damage, providing a secure grip and protection against accidental impacts.




  • Steel Clip – Allows for quick attachment to a belt or pocket, making transportation and storage during work more convenient.




  • Practical Wrist Strap – An additional option for comfortably holding the tool during measurements.

The double-sided measuring tape with a length of 3 meters and a tape width of 16 mm is the ideal tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Thanks to its design and high-quality materials, this tape meets the demands of the most discerning users. Perfect for workshop, construction, carpentry, renovation, and all kinds of household tasks. Suitable for both professional and amateur use.


Features and Benefits:




  • Double-Sided Measuring Tape – Enables precise readings on both the front and back of the tape, enhancing convenience during use.




  • Class 1 Accuracy – Ensures precise measurements in accordance with European standards, perfect for tasks requiring the highest accuracy.




  • Durable Tape (3m Length, 16mm Width) – Offers readability, strength, and stability during measurements.




  • Rubberized Casing – A durable housing resistant to damage, providing a secure grip and protection against accidental impacts.




  • Steel Clip – Allows for quick attachment to a belt or pocket, making transportation and storage during work more convenient.




  • Practical Wrist Strap – An additional option for comfortably holding the tool during measurements.

description.name: Double-sided nylon measure tape with auto-stop 3m/16mm CLASS I – display box
description.long_desc:
A practical and reliable measuring tool, perfect for everyday tasks in the workshop, on construction sites, or at home. With its double-sided scale and innovative autostop function, it offers convenience and precision, while its sturdy construction ensures durability and user comfort.



  • Double-sided scale – Allows quick and easy reading of measurements, regardless of the tape's position.

  • Autostop function – The tape extends smoothly and stays in place until the button is pressed, making it much easier to operate with one hand.

  • Bend resistance – The tape maintains stability and straightness up to a length of 160 cm.

  • Rubber casing – Provides a secure, comfortable grip and protects the tape mechanism from mechanical damage.

  • Strong brake – Ensures controlled tape extension and retraction, eliminating the risk of uncontrolled tape movement.

  • Fast retraction – The mechanism operates efficiently, allowing the tool to be quickly prepared for the next measurement.

  • Accuracy Class I – The highest standard of precision, ideal for tasks requiring faultless measurements.

  • Nylon protective coating – Shields the tape's scale from scratches and rust.

  • Polyester string – Outperforms rubber alternatives with its resistance to weather conditions, eliminating the risk of cracking and ensuring greater durability.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: Metal, nylon coating, plastic, rubber

  • Type: Double-sided

  • Tape Length: 3 m

  • Tape Width: 16 mm

  • Accuracy Class: I

  • Bend Resistance: Up to 160 cm

  • Casing: Rubber

  • Polyester string

  • Belt clip

description.name: Double-sided nylon measure tape with magnet and auto-stop 3m/16mm CLASS I – display box
description.long_desc:
Double-Sided Measuring Tape with Magnet and Autostop 3m/16mm Class 1 – Precision and Functionality in One Tool!


The double-sided measuring tape with a magnet and autostop is a reliable tool designed for demanding users. Combining innovative features such as automatic tape lock and a sturdy magnetic hook ensures comfortable operation and precise measurements in any conditions. Ideal for professional construction, workshop, and renovation tasks, as well as for home use. Thanks to its magnetic hook and autostop function, it is particularly useful for measurements requiring one-handed operation.


Product Features:




  • Double-Sided Measuring Tape – Allows for convenient readings on both the front and back of the tape, speeding up and simplifying work.




  • Autostop Function – Automatically locks the tape when extended, providing convenience and saving time during measurements.




  • Magnetic Hook – A strong magnet on the tape's end facilitates measurements on metal surfaces, increasing stability.




  • Length of 3m and Width of 16mm – The ideal dimensions ensure readability and ease of use.




  • Class 1 Accuracy – The highest precision standard compliant with European norms, perfect for professional applications.




  • Rubberized Casing – A durable housing resistant to impacts, offering a secure grip and long-lasting performance.




  • Steel Clip – Enables easy attachment to a belt or pocket, enhancing mobility and convenience.




  • Wrist Strap – Provides additional security and comfort during use.

description.short_desc:
Double-Sided Measuring Tape with Magnet and Autostop 8m/25mm Class 1 – Precision and Functionality in One Tool!


The double-sided measuring tape with a magnet and autostop is a reliable tool designed for demanding users. Combining innovative features such as automatic tape lock and a sturdy magnetic hook ensures comfortable operation and precise measurements in any conditions. Ideal for professional construction, workshop, and renovation tasks, as well as for home use. Thanks to its magnetic hook and autostop function, it is particularly useful for measurements requiring one-handed operation.


Product Features:




  • Double-Sided Measuring Tape – Allows for convenient readings on both the front and back of the tape, speeding up and simplifying work.




  • Autostop Function – Automatically locks the tape when extended, providing convenience and saving time during measurements.




  • Magnetic Hook – A strong magnet on the tape's end facilitates measurements on metal surfaces, increasing stability.




  • Length of 8m and Width of 25mm – The ideal dimensions ensure readability and ease of use.




  • Class 1 Accuracy – The highest precision standard compliant with European norms, perfect for professional applications.




  • Rubberized Casing – A durable housing resistant to impacts, offering a secure grip and long-lasting performance.




  • Steel Clip – Enables easy attachment to a belt or pocket, enhancing mobility and convenience.




  • Wrist Strap – Provides additional security and comfort during use.

description.name: Open frame surveyors tape 50m
description.long_desc:
The Tvardy Steel Geodetic Measuring Tape is an indispensable tool for anyone needing precision and reliability over long distances. Equipped with a robust, 50-meter steel tape, it is an ideal choice for professionals in the geodetic and construction industries, as well as for those tackling more advanced outdoor projects. Thanks to its thoughtful design and user-friendly features, such as a rubber grip and a convenient winding handle, this measuring tape ensures accurate measurements even in demanding conditions.



  • Durable Material – The tape is made from high-quality steel, providing durability and resistance to deformation, even under heavy use.

  • Precise Scale in cm and mm – Large, easy-to-read markings guarantee measurement accuracy, which is crucial for geodetic, construction, and fieldwork applications.

  • Ergonomic Rubber Handle – Ensures a secure grip and comfort during prolonged use.

  • Convenient Winding Handle – Allows for quick and hassle-free retraction of the tape after use.

  • Metal Hook – Simplifies stable anchoring of the tape at the starting point, making measurements easier and more precise.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Material: Steel, plastic

  • Tape Length: 50 m

  • Units: cm / mm

  • Tape Width: 12.5 mm


Includes a comfortable rubber grip and a large, easy-to-read scale for maximum convenience.

description.name: Garden two-bed hammock 190x150cm 200kg
description.long_desc:
Introducing our 2-person garden hammock with a wooden stabilizer, measuring 190x150 cm, capable of supporting up to 200 kg – an ideal choice for couples and families who want to relax together outdoors!


Relax in your garden, on your balcony, or during trips with our 2-person garden hammock with a wooden stabilizer. Its sturdy construction, ample space, and elegant design will make every moment spent outdoors exceptional.


Product Features:



  • Ample Space: The hammock measuring 190x150 cm provides enough room for two people to comfortably lie down and enjoy relaxing moments together.

  • Sturdy Wooden Stabilizer: Built-in wooden stabilizers at both ends of the hammock ensure even weight distribution, increasing comfort and stability during use.

  • Durable Construction: Made from high-quality, robust material, the hammock guarantees long-lasting use. Strong ropes and solid knots ensure safety even at maximum load.

  • Stylish Design: A modern combination of blue and green colors adds elegance and style, perfectly complementing various garden arrangements.

  • Easy Installation: The hammock is easy to set up with the included strong ropes. You can hang it between trees, on a stand, or other stable structures.

  • Portable and Convenient: The set includes a handy bag for easy carrying and storage of the hammock. Its compact size when folded makes it convenient to take on trips, camping, or to the beach.

description.name: Garden hammock 190x80cm 200kg
description.long_desc:
Introducing our unique garden hammock with dimensions of 190x80 cm, capable of supporting up to 200 kg – an ideal addition to any garden, terrace, or balcony!


Relax in your garden, on your balcony, or during nature trips with our 190x80 cm garden hammock. Its sturdy construction, comfortable design, and vibrant colors will make every moment spent outdoors even more enjoyable.


Product Features:



  • Durable Construction: The hammock is made from high-quality materials, ensuring its durability and comfort. Strong ropes and solid knots guarantee safety even at maximum load.

  • Comfortable and Spacious: The dimensions of 190x80 cm provide plenty of space to comfortably lie down and relax. Perfect for one person to fully enjoy a moment of respite outdoors.

  • Colorful Design: Bright, multicolored stripes add style and energy to any setting where you hang it. It fits well in both modern and traditional garden arrangements.

  • Easy to Assemble: The hammock is easy to attach with the included strong strings. You can effortlessly hang it between trees, on a stand, or other stable structures.

  • Portable and Lightweight: The set includes a handy bag, making it easy to take the hammock on trips, camping, or to the beach. When folded, it takes up little space, making it easy to store.
